page.title: 07MOVING IN BY AVISHAI & CALUM
page.content: We moved here in July 1984.We had stayed in a rented house in{Edinburgh and before that in an old house in {Eskdalmuir,}Dumfries-shire.We moved here because of the forestry and also to be near the sea. We chose this part of the{North West {Highlands }because of the exciting landscape.Our particular house has a magnificent view of the mountains and the sea. We can also grow some of our own food and keep some animals on our own land. We now attend a school with only eight pupils. We prefer being in a smaller school because you have more use of the{computer.}We also like this school because we get more fun in class.One of the things we would like to see changed is that we do not have enough proper ground to play on, our playground is too small and bumpy!
